## Files Modified
1. `skia-build/build-windows.bat` - Added incremental build support, Graphite/Vulkan, sccache, timing

## Features Added
1. `/clean` flag - Only removes out dir when explicitly requested (enables incremental builds)
2. `skia_use_vulkan = true` + `skia_enable_graphite = true` - Enables Graphite with Vulkan backend
3. sccache auto-detection - Uses sccache if available for faster clean builds
4. Build time reporting - Shows start/end time in output
